actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 17, title 38, United States Code, to provide hospital care and medical services abroad to an alien, who was never an American citizen for any service-connected disability incurred while serving in the Armed Forces of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide hospital care and medical services abroad to an alien, who was never an American citizen for any service-connected disability incurred while serving in the Armed Forces of the United States. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 624(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 17, title 38, United States Code, to provide hospital care and medical services abroad to an alien, who was never an American citizen for any service-connected disability incurred while serving in the Armed Forces of the United States.
